Articles.Content:
HAVE 105 VERSION.. A LOT OF MODS WHICH ARE LOADED CORRECTLY. HAVE DUMPED EVERYTHING AT LEAST THREE OR FOUR TIMES AND STARTED NEW. WENT SO FAR AS BUYING A LENOVO K450 GAMING COMPUTER  WITH NO SUCCESS. STILL CRASHES DURING LANDINGS AND GOING TO VAB. ERROR REPORT AS FOLLOWS. REALLY TIRED OF SPENDING MORE TIME LOADING THE GAME THEN PLAYING IT.

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.6.4f1_99f88340878d]

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0023:10107259.

Error occurred at 2016-03-05_213850.
C:\Users\Owner\Downloads\ksp-win-1-0-5\KSP_win\KSP.exe, run by Owner.
60% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [3234 MB free].
0 MB paging file [3237 MB free].
0 MB user address space [74 MB free].
Write to location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Context:
EDI:    0x00000001  ESI: 0xe68c1630  EAX:   0x00000000
EBX:    0xe69b4200  ECX: 0x00000000  EDX:   0x3d8f1230
EIP:    0x10107259  EBP: 0x009df3b0  SegCs: 0x00000023
EFlags: 0x00210246  ESP: 0x009df3ac  SegSs: 0x0000002b

Bytes at CS:EIP:
89 14 81 ff 46 04 5e 5d c3 55 8b ec 53 8b 5d 08

Hello and welcome to the forum,i do understand your frustration,but this is not the place to express your anger.I think that the biggest culprit for your troubles is yourself.

9 hours ago, KNOEBBER said:

A LOT OF MODS WHICH ARE LOADED CORRECTLY

You must understand that KSP is not AAA game that depend on hardware,it's using unity 4,which cannot support more than 3.5 GB(32bit) of system memory(except for linux).Your crash is occurring because that limit is exceeded.
I hope this will satisfy your rage,but for the future please read FAQ and how to get proper support.
